text:
Octopart | Full time NYC Onsite | Marketing positions and UX Designer | https://octopart.com/jobs

Octopart is a search engine for electronic parts. We are looking for a VP of marketing, marketing specialist, and UX designer to join our growing team in New York City. All benefits and job descriptions are listed on the jobs link above.

Beyond these roles, we are always on the lookout for excellent people passionate about search and electronic design. If this is you, please reach out, even if we don't necessarily have a job listing for your area of expertise.

Email jobs@octopart.com
